name: SCP Tales of the Unnamed
description:
WARNING: By purchasing this game you accept that the game was made as a school project by 4 people with no prior experience in Unity or much of game making in general, and was never fully completed. The game is unfinished and unpolished, has features missing and has loads of bugs and the major reason you buy this is to support starting students to get better at making games.

Your story is not a grand one. Your name will not go down in history as one of a hero or a villain. It will not even be remembered...

This game aims to tell the stories of people who's story has no happy ending. of those who did their job and paid the ultimate price.

Licencing:

Content relating to the SCP Foundation, including the SCP Foundation logo, is licensed under Creative Commons Sharealike 3.0 and all concepts originate from http://www.scpwiki.com and its authors. SCP Tales of the Unnamed being derived from this content, is hereby also released under Creative Commons Sharealike 3.0.
